name: The Tiles Control
description:
You Find Yourself Trapped In A Strange Dungeon. It's More Colourful Than You Would Ever Imagine A Dungeon. You Notice The Ticking Clock, You Must Move Quickly. Who Knows What Could Happen If The Clock Ran Out...

A Tile Based Speedrun/Puzzle Game With Some Elements Of Rage Sprinkled In >:)

Make In 12 Hours For The GMTK2021 Jam By A One Man Team

The Theme Of The Jam Was Joined Together so I Incorporated It By Joining The Background And The  Movement. (Some Tiles May Make You Move In Strange, Confusing Ways)

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Move Down

R - Reset Level

Z - Return To Level Select
